mapper.sql: id, firstName, lastName, telephone, email, balance, username, password
mapper.select:
select
from fundmanager where username LIKE '%${username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}%'
mapper.insert: insert into fundmanager (id, firstName, lastName, telephone, email, balance, username, password) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

firstName = #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
